sentences.sContent: everyday chores like shopping and housework
sentences.sCn: 购物和做家务之类的日常琐事

sentences.sContent: I find driving a real chore.
sentences.sCn: 我觉得开车是一件很讨厌的事情。

synos.tran: 家庭杂务；日常的零星事务；讨厌的或累人的工作

remMethod.val: 家庭杂务(chore)总是令人很烦(bore)

trans.tranOther: a small job that you have to do regularly, especially work that you do to keep a house clean
